name.description: The name of the service instance
name.title: Service name

user.description: The user that the service will run as.
user.title: User

service_account_secret.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.
service_account_secret.title: Credential secret name (optional)

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

marathon_lb_vhost.description: The domain name to make airfield available under, must be pointing to your marathon-lb

marathon_lb_base_host.title: Base host to expose zeppelin instances under
marathon_lb_base_host.description: Hostnames will be construced as <instance-name><marathon_lb_base_host>, e.g. marathon_lb_base_host=".zeppelin.mycorp" results in hosts of the form someinstance.zeppelin.mycorp.

consul_endpoint.title: Endpoint for consul
consul_endpoint.description: HTTP Endpoint for consul, e.g. "http://api.consul.l4lb.thisdcos.directory:8500/v1" if you use the consul package. Either this or etcd_endpoint must be set

etcd_endpoint.title: Endpoint for etcd
etcd_endpoint.description: Endpoint for etcd in the form host:port, e.g. "etcd.marathon.l4lb.thisdcos.directory:2379". Either this or consul_endpoint must be set

app_group.title: Marathon App group for zeppelin instances
app_group.description: app group to start zeppelin instances under. If not set "airfield-zeppelin" is used.

config_base_key.title: Key prefix in consul/etcd
config_base_key.description: Key prefix in consul/etcd to use for storing airfield config. If not set "airfield" is used.

dcos_base_url.title: Base URL of the DC/OS adminrouter
dcos_base_url.description: URL of the DC/OS adminrouter. Default works under EE clusters in permissive/strict mode. Set this to "http://leader.mesos" if running on OpenSource DC/OS
